Government.llitary Secret,1441 from Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India, 2bth November 1920. 6159 No. 221. Part I. 1. As result of aerial operations on 12th and 15th November, Hassan Zai andTilli Sayyids of Black Mountains have handed in balance of rifles. 2. Twenty-four rifles handed in by Afridis since 30th October, of which 18 were from hitherto hostile Shalobai Kambar Khel. 3. Following departures of troops reported from Kabul during, first week ofNovember: -Two battalions for Jalalabad, one battalion for Khost, two battalions and 300 Sappers and Miners for Mazar-i-Sharif. Some of these probably newly raisedbattalions. Considerable recruiting activity on Hasht-Nafri system throughoutAfghanistan continues. Two newly raised battalions or large batches of recruitsreported left Mukur for Kabul end of October.Part II. (Nil.)Para. 3 not given to Press.X
